response.original_title: History Special: 51 Amazing Facts About America
response.overview: Amazing people, amazing places and amazing things! This special zips across the US looking for the facts. From our founding fathers' favorite treats to buried treasure, very old bones from a swamp to the ever-expanding earth, gold and gems in unusual places to whiskers in the White House, lightning, volcanoes and presidential grandchildren. So many facts--so little time!
response.title: History Special: 51 Amazing Facts About America
